content: 2 cc k2 p1 sl m k1 sl m p1 k2 cc5 stripes and 385 sts cut cc5 work 72 row in stripe pattern see stitch guide using cc1 with mc work row 1 and 2 of stripe pattern a total of 3 for a total of 19 cc1 stripes and 151 sts cut cc1 and join times then work row 1 again 401 sts bind off knitwise on cc2 ws work 44 row in stripe pattern using cc2 for a total of 11 finishing cc2 stripes and 239 sts cut cc2 and join cc3 weave in ends block to finished measurements work 32 row in stripe pattern using cc3 for a total of 8 cc3 stripes and 303 sts cut cc3 and join cc4 all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 7/22/22 © fairmount fibers ltd 2017 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 3 of 3
